You are the creator of destiny. Collecting the past of a person from the fragments, you must understand his fate and prevent death.

The death of a loved one is a terrible tragedy that brings only grief and emptiness. You are the creator of destiny. You are able to stop the passage of time and move various moments of the deceased's life to save him from death and give him another chance. You can only influence for brief moments, but your careful intervention should be enough. Now the events of the past will develop in a new way, and the fate of the deceased will follow a different path.

First you have to find out the circumstances of the death that you need to prevent. At the beginning of the game, one of the 13 Story Cards will open. In total, you can open only 10 of them in the game, including the first card.
In the upper-left part of the History Map, the date, the place of the moment, and the story itself, which takes place at this moment, are written.

In the lower-left part of the History Map, you will see possible options for changing the past. If you managed to change the past for the better, you get points, and if you only made it worse, you lose. If you didn't change anything, you doomed the deceased to repeat his fate and got 0 points. You can only choose once, so choose carefully.

You can use the Hint Map located in the upper-right part of the History Map corresponding to the current History Map. To see the hint, click on the image. But remember, you can only open 5 Hint Cards per game.
In the lower right part of the History Map, there is a button to close the History Map.
This is what the History Map looks like when you read it. To open it, click on the map again.
Each History Map has the date and place of the history event written on it.
Here you can see how many more History Cards you can open.
Here you can see how many more Hint Cards you can open.
These two buttons are responsible for turning the music on and off.
With this button, you can end the game and go to the main menu.
The game will end when you have no History Cards left. Еhe game will automatically count your points and show you what result you managed to achieve. Have a nice game)

The parents of the deceased Taro Totomi died in the bombing of Herashima when Taro was 10 years old. He survived because his parents sent him to his grandmother a few days before the tragedy. The last memory of his parents was the broken vase and the reproaches of his father. When he was 15, Taro left the village for the big city. His grandmother gave him a blue suit that she had once made for his father. Taro got married. His wife was terminally ill, but gave birth to a son and a daughter. The children grew up convinced that their father had cheated on his terminally ill wife and taken the children to a new wife, leaving their mother to die alone. In fact, the dying woman asked her husband to marry her friend. She didn't want her children to see her agonizing death and grow up without a mother. Because of the traditions and cultural characteristics, they decided to keep it a secret from the children. On a tragic day, Taro was going to fly to his daughter to tell the truth. All these years she had not answered his letters. Unfortunately, he missed his flight. When he returned home, his second wife ran away in tears because she found a letter indicating his infidelity.Neither she or her husband knew that this letter was his daughter's revenge. When the second wife of the Tarot broke the vase on his father and left his life as there are only small pieces. He passed away with a handful of pills washed down with a glass of wine and a photograph of his dead first wife in his hand.

Important decisions:
A month ago - c: Taro was looking for pills to commit suicide, but found only vitamins that the pharmacist sold to his wife.
A week ago - b: When Taro's daughter finally read one of his writings, she found out the truth and decided to talk to him.
Three days ago - c: Taro's son had been worried about his father for a long time. After reading about suicides, he sent his father a book that could help him. After looking through several pages, Taro began to doubt his decision.
An hour and a half ago - c: Due to the persistence of the courier, Taro received a package from his son. So he remembered that there are people in the world for whom he is important.
